tool_description: REST API to add, customize and search text and image watermarks within documents of various file formats.
name: GroupDocs Watermark Cloud
title: GroupDocs Watermark Cloud

api_list.name: StorageExists
DownloadFile
GetDiscUsage
ObjectExists

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: File or folder path e.g. '/file.ext' or '/folder'

api_list.name: GetSupportedFileFormats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/watermark/formats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/watermark/formats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-watermark-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

schema.description: Describes object which contains list of supported file formats.

api_list.name: GetFileVersions

IsFolder.description: True if it is a folder.

ModifiedDate.description: File or folder last modified DateTime.

IsLatest.description: Specifies whether the file is (true) or is not (false) the latest version of an file.
